::Zardus::

Zardus looks at Shocker, Icedeamon, Tritan, and Arcangel in surprise. He 
turns to Liono.

"Is this your idea of 'alone', Liono?" he asks. The maximal commander had, 
after all asked them to come alone, it was very strange if he brought 
troops...
